board.name: OpenTurn
board.summary: Open source Motor Controler based on Infineon PSoC 62x4 microcontroler, Infineon TLE5012 hall rotary endocer and Infineon 6EDL7141 MosFET driver.
board.prov_capabilities: adc can cat1 comp cy8ckit_062s4 dac dma flash_256k hal i2c j2 led low_power lptimer mcu_gp memory multi_core opamp psoc6 rtc smart_io spi sram_128k std_crypto switch uart
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • Delivers dual-cores, with a 150-MHz Arm Cortex-M4 as the primary application processor and a 100-MHz Arm Cortex-M0+ as the secondary processor.
  • 256-KB Flash and 128-KB SRAM for customer application on CM4
  • TLE5012 hall rotary endocer
  • 6EDL7141 3 phase smart gate driver
  • IAUC120N06S5L032 MosFET
  • 3 current shunts
  • CAN-FD interface
